languages.text: Из сохранившихся инфоархивов служителям Адептус Механикус удалось узнать, что судно попало в поток астероидов и потерпело крушение около трех веков назад. В надежде спасти хоть часть колонистов, капитан отослала четыре спасательных шлюпки — их трагическая судьба вам уже известна. Время и погодные условия не пощадили и "Молот искупления", однако команде все же удалось вынести с него немало ценных вещей.

traits.locale_text: Из сохранившихся инфоархивов служителям Адептус Механикус удалось узнать, что судно попало в поток астероидов и потерпело крушение около трех веков назад. В надежде спасти хоть часть колонистов, капитан отослала четыре спасательных шлюпки — их трагическая судьба вам уже известна. Время и погодные условия не пощадили и "Молот искупления", однако команде все же удалось вынести с него немало ценных вещей.

languages.text: The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.
languages.original_text: Из сохранившихся инфоархивов служителям Адептус Механикус удалось узнать, что судно попало в поток астероидов и потерпело крушение около трех веков назад. В надежде спасти хоть часть колонистов, капитан отослала четыре спасательных шлюпки — их трагическая судьба вам уже известна. Время и погодные условия не пощадили и "Молот искупления", однако команде все же удалось вынести с него немало ценных вещей.

Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

Although time and weather were not kind to Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

languages.text: 机械修会的侍仆们研究了古代的数据档案，并得出结论，这艘船在大约在三百年前撞上了一颗流星，随后坠毁。当时的舰长派出了四艘救生船，想要尽可能地拯救一部分殖民者，但你已经得知了那些人的悲惨命运。尽管打捞的天气与世纪都并不算太合适，但你的船员们仍成功地从打捞起了大量有价值的物品。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的侍仆们研究了古代的数据档案，并得出结论，这艘船在大约在三百年前撞上了一颗流星，随后坠毁。当时的舰长派出了四艘救生船，想要尽可能地拯救一部分殖民者，但你已经得知了那些人的悲惨命运。尽管打捞的天气与世纪都并不算太合适，但你的船员们仍成功地从打捞起了大量有价值的物品。

languages.text: 帝国技術局のアコライトが古代のデータアーカイブを調査した結果、この船は約300年前に小惑星の流れに衝突して墜落したと結論づけられた。数人だけであっても入植者を救出しようと、船長は4隻の救命艇を派遣したが、その悲惨な運命は皆の知るところである。時間と天候は「贖罪の鉄槌」に厳しかったが、それでもクルーたちは貴重な品々を引き揚げることができた。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局のアコライトが古代のデータアーカイブを調査した結果、この船は約300年前に小惑星の流れに衝突して墜落したと結論づけられた。数人だけであっても入植者を救出しようと、船長は4隻の救命艇を派遣したが、その悲惨な運命は皆の知るところである。時間と天候は「贖罪の鉄槌」に厳しかったが、それでもクルーたちは貴重な品々を引き揚げることができた。

languages.text: Los acólitos del Adeptus Mechanicus estudiaron los archivos de datos antiguos y llegaron a la conclusión de que la nave se estrelló hace unos trescientos años tras chocar contra una cadena de asteroides. Con la esperanza de rescatar al menos a algunos de los colonos, el capitán envió cuatro cápsulas salvavidas cuyo trágico destino ya conoces. Aunque el tiempo y el clima no han sido benévolos con el Martillo de Redención, la tripulación consigue rescatar muchos objetos valiosos.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

traits.locale_text: Los acólitos del Adeptus Mechanicus estudiaron los archivos de datos antiguos y llegaron a la conclusión de que la nave se estrelló hace unos trescientos años tras chocar contra una cadena de asteroides. Con la esperanza de rescatar al menos a algunos de los colonos, el capitán envió cuatro cápsulas salvavidas cuyo trágico destino ya conoces. Aunque el tiempo y el clima no han sido benévolos con el Martillo de Redención, la tripulación consigue rescatar muchos objetos valiosos.

languages.text: Die Akolythen des Adeptus Mechanicus studierten die uralten Datenarchive und kamen zu dem Schluss, dass das Schiff vor etwa dreihundert Jahren abgestürzt sein musste, nachdem es in einen Asteroidenstrom geraten war. In der Hoffnung, zumindest einen Teil der Kolonisten zu retten, hatte der Captain vier Rettungsboote losgeschickt, von deren tragischem Schicksal du bereits weißt. Die Zeit und die Witterung haben der Hammer der Erlösung arg zugesetzt, aber die Crew konnte doch viele wertvolle Objekte bergen.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

traits.locale_text: Die Akolythen des Adeptus Mechanicus studierten die uralten Datenarchive und kamen zu dem Schluss, dass das Schiff vor etwa dreihundert Jahren abgestürzt sein musste, nachdem es in einen Asteroidenstrom geraten war. In der Hoffnung, zumindest einen Teil der Kolonisten zu retten, hatte der Captain vier Rettungsboote losgeschickt, von deren tragischem Schicksal du bereits weißt. Die Zeit und die Witterung haben der Hammer der Erlösung arg zugesetzt, aber die Crew konnte doch viele wertvolle Objekte bergen.

languages.text: En étudiant ses archives antiques, les acolytes de l'Adeptus Mechanicus apprennent que le vaisseau s'est écrasé il y a environ trois cents ans après avoir croisé un champ d'astéroïdes. Espérant secourir au moins une partie des colons, son capitaine a alors déployé quatre modules de sauvetage dont le sort tragique vous est déjà connu. Si le temps et le climat n'ont pas été tendres avec le Marteau de la Rédemption, l'équipage parvient tout de même à récupérer bon nombre d'objets précieux.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.

traits.locale_text: En étudiant ses archives antiques, les acolytes de l'Adeptus Mechanicus apprennent que le vaisseau s'est écrasé il y a environ trois cents ans après avoir croisé un champ d'astéroïdes. Espérant secourir au moins une partie des colons, son capitaine a alors déployé quatre modules de sauvetage dont le sort tragique vous est déjà connu. Si le temps et le climat n'ont pas été tendres avec le Marteau de la Rédemption, l'équipage parvient tout de même à récupérer bon nombre d'objets précieux.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus havarileri, kadim veri arşivlerini inceleyip geminin yaklaşık üç yüz yıl önce bir asteroit tarlasına girdikten sonra düştüğü sonucuna varıyor. En azından kolonistlerin bir kısmını kurtarabilmeyi uman kaptan, trajik kaderinden haberdar olduğumuz dört filika göndermiş. Zaman ve hava koşulları Kefaret Çekici'ne nazik davranmasa da mürettebat, pek çok değerli eşyayı kurtarmayı başarıyor.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus acolytes studied the ancient data archives and concluded that the vessel crashed about three hundred years ago after running into an asteroid stream. Hoping to rescue at least some of the colonists, the captain dispatched four lifeboats whose tragic fate you already know. Although time and weather were not kind to the Hammer of Redemption, the crew still managed to salvage plenty of valuable items.
